TopicTitle: All my stages at once! help!

Articles.Content:
when i press spacebar to start the launch, it toggle all of my phases at once:(, parachute, liquid engine, solid fuel boosters all toggle at once and i need help! thanks!

Edited September 29, 2013 by Estro

Have you checked the staging order on the right in the VAB? It may all be in one box. If it is move them into the right order

You can also re-arrange the stages in flight

Hope I helped!

Welcome to the Forums, by the way.

You can click and drag on one of the parts in the "STAGE" list on your right, where each icon represents a parachute (icon looks like a parachute), a radial decoupler or side mounted decoupler (Looks like 2 bars on the left and right with a dot in the middle), a linear decoupler (2 bars on the top and bottom with a dot in the middle, do not confuse with radials!), or an engine (Looks kind of like an engine). Once you mouse over a part in the STAGE list, the game will highlight the part with a faint green shader, which will let you know which icon means what. In reverse, mousing over a part on the ship creates a white box over the icon, which can identify part to icon also. If you want to create another stage, mouse over the numbered orange labes (such as 01 or 00) in the STAGE sequence, and a plus and a minus will appear next to it. To add another stage, click the plus. If you want to get rid of an empty stage, click the minus.

tl;dr: Make another stage, drag and drops the parts you want to go first at the bottom of the list and put them in order from there.

Have fun!
